testcase.name: user_should_signup_with_valid_email
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login/Registration page....................................passed When user clicks email box and input valid data "mv@vm.com".................passed When clicks signup button...................................................passed Then user should not see red message under email box........................passed

testcase.name: user_should_not_signup_with_invalid_email
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login/Registration page....................................passed When user clicks email box and input invalid data "mw"......................passed When clicks signup button...................................................passed Then user should see red message under email box............................passed
